name: Infinite Platformer
description: This is an endless Platformer where you may never know when it ends and there is no counter, so therefore no way to track progress. You are stuck in an endless platformer, so it would be best to try to enjoy it, but it may be harder to enjoy, because it's hard and sometimes your force/momentum is retained, which mean you can fall off easy, because you we rotating, but to help press Backspace to reset rotation.
